proteins.name: Porcine Hemoglobin
proteins.description: Aquomet porcine hemoglobin, an oxygen-carrying protein from pig blood. Shows quaternary structure with alpha and beta chains.

proteins.name: Crambin
proteins.description: A small hydrophobic plant protein with 46 amino acids. Commonly used for X-ray crystallography method development.

proteins.name: Bovine Pancreatic Trypsin Inhibitor
proteins.description: A classic protein inhibitor with well-defined structure. Contains three disulfide bonds and is highly stable.

proteins.name: Adenylate Kinase
proteins.description: An enzyme that catalyzes the interconversion of adenine nucleotides. Shows significant conformational changes upon substrate binding.

proteins.name: Hemoglobin
proteins.description: The oxygen-carrying protein in red blood cells. A classic example of quaternary protein structure with four subunits.
